input: What’s the new TDS rule for partner remuneration in FY 2025-26?
output: From April 1, 2025, Section 194T (introduced in Budget 2024) mandates 10% TDS on payments to partners (e.g., remuneration, commission, interest, bonus) exceeding ₹20,000 per financial year by partnership firms/LLPs. Example: ₹50,000 remuneration → ₹5,000 TDS. Deposit by the 7th of next month, file Form 26Q. This increases compliance for partnerships.
